meta.description: Optimize production to minimize total compensation and storage costs for products I, II, and III over four quarters.

params.name: contract_booking
params.description: Contract booking numbers for each product and quarter

params.name: production_time_per_unit
params.description: Production time required per unit of each product

params.name: production_time_available
params.description: Total production time available per quarter

params.name: compensation_cost
params.description: Compensation cost per unit per quarter for late delivery

params.name: storage_cost
params.description: Storage cost per unit per quarter

vars.name: produce
vars.description: Units of product produced in each quarter

vars.name: inventory
vars.description: Inventory of product at the end of each quarter

vars.name: compensation
vars.description: Units of product not delivered on time, incurring compensation

objective.name: min_total_cost
objective.expr: sum(compensation[p][q] * compensation_cost[p] + inventory[p][q] * storage_cost for p in PRODUCTS for q in QUARTERS)
objective.description: Minimize total compensation and storage costs

constraints.name: production_time_q1
constraints.expr_lhs: produce['I']['1'] * production_time_per_unit['I'] + produce['II']['1'] * production_time_per_unit['II'] + produce['III']['1'] * production_time_per_unit['III']

constraints.name: production_time_q2
constraints.description: Production time constraint for quarter 2 (Product I cannot be produced)

constraints.name: production_time_q3
constraints.expr_lhs: produce['I']['3'] * production_time_per_unit['I'] + produce['II']['3'] * production_time_per_unit['II'] + produce['III']['3'] * production_time_per_unit['III']

constraints.name: production_time_q4
constraints.expr_lhs: produce['I']['4'] * production_time_per_unit['I'] + produce['II']['4'] * production_time_per_unit['II'] + produce['III']['4'] * production_time_per_unit['III']

constraints.name: inventory_balance_I_q1
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product I at the end of quarter 1

constraints.name: inventory_balance_I_q2
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product I at the end of quarter 2

constraints.name: inventory_balance_I_q3
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product I at the end of quarter 3

constraints.name: inventory_balance_I_q4
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product I at the end of quarter 4

constraints.name: inventory_balance_II_q1
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product II at the end of quarter 1

constraints.name: inventory_balance_II_q2
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product II at the end of quarter 2

constraints.name: inventory_balance_II_q3
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product II at the end of quarter 3

constraints.name: inventory_balance_II_q4
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product II at the end of quarter 4

constraints.name: inventory_balance_III_q1
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product III at the end of quarter 1

constraints.name: inventory_balance_III_q2
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product III at the end of quarter 2

constraints.name: inventory_balance_III_q3
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product III at the end of quarter 3

constraints.name: inventory_balance_III_q4
constraints.description: Inventory balance for product III at the end of quarter 4

constraints.name: end_inventory_I
constraints.description: End inventory requirement for product I

constraints.name: end_inventory_II
constraints.description: End inventory requirement for product II

constraints.name: end_inventory_III
constraints.description: End inventory requirement for product III
